name: Culina: Hands in the Kitchen
description: Culina: Hands in the Kitchen is a visual novel/strategy game. Step into the shoes of a culinary school graduate who is starting up his very own restaurant. Create recipes, sell to customers, build relationships, and more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1920x1080 Preferred DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
